summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of MINDLY AI tutoring app. All core features working perfectly including landing page, 8-step onboarding flow, chat interface with personalized AI responses using VARK methodology and cultural references.
passed_tests: Backend API root endpoint (/api/) returns success
Chat messaging (POST /api/chat) with AI integration working perfectly
Landing page loads with all 'Começar Grátis' buttons functional
Complete 8-step onboarding flow working (name, VARK, style, approach, social, motivation, cultural interest)
Chat interface loads with personalized welcome message using user name and cultural interests
Message sending with subject selection working correctly
AI responses include VARK adaptations and cultural analogies as expected
All data-testid attributes present for automated testing
Session management and sidebar functionality working
Subject indicator in chat header working
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (6/6 tests passed), Frontend: 100% (all flows working)
